summary:
West Germany, officially the Federal Republic of Germany, existed from 1949 to 1990. It was formed after World War II in the Western Allied zones. During the Cold War, it was part of the Western Bloc. West Germany became a strong economic power and joined NATO and the European Union's predecessors. 

In 1990, it reunited with East Germany, forming the current Germany. This reunification kept West Germany's political system and international alliances, making it a direct continuation of the state.
title: West Germany
